task.title: Clean The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can clean your typewriter platen by using a lint free cloth to apply lacquer thinner to the platen until residue and debris is fully removed.

step.note: The paper release lever must be activated so that the feed and paper bail rollers are not touching the platen.

step.cmd: Apply a light layer of lacquer thinner to a clean, lint free cloth.
Rub the platen with the cloth along the entire surface of the roller.
Allow the lacquer thinner on the platen to dry down.
Repeat steps 1 through 3 until little to no residue can be seen on the cloth.
If you notice your feed rollers or paper bail rollers are dirty, clean them using steps 1 through 3.
